data.message: How do I report photos of my child to Facebook in order to have them taken down when someone else posted them without my permission? I don't like a bunch of random people I don't know on this person's Facebook page being able to see and have photos of my child.

replies.message: Hi Hannah. Thanks for reaching out. To report a photo, please follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2bkIJjY. -Brad
Dear Facebook Can I transfer my personal home page to its predecessor of the same name was created earlier and copy all the friends I hope give me a link to it for conversion

Hey there. We don't currently offer a way to merge two accounts. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2b7lgPV. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. Thanks! -Jessica
I want to integrate my friends on my profile to a page created by

Facebook needs to come up with a way for people to lock their pictures in, or something , so people can't steal them,  to me , the way people steal other people's photos is equivalent to someone coming into someone's house and stealing their photo albums

Who can help me? I wrote a comment on this post , facebook did not answer me.
when I created a facebook acct years agi it was in english, all of a sudden it is in spanish and dont know how to change it back
Facebook, I sent a message. Can you please check it, i really need help :(

FB will just come back and say they didnt find anything wrong with it if you do report. I dont think they know what they are doing when determining whats right and whats wrong. They dont even find things wrong if someone steals pictures of handicapped people or mutliated puppies that ask to type AMEN to scam people. I had a friend get reported soley for posting an article about Stallone dying being a hoax meanwhile they trended it on FB. Think FB makes money off of all these shares and likes scams or not.
